Package data

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
data.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnemyCube, EnemyFlame, EnemyImp, EnemySlime
public class Enemy extends Object implements Entity
The super class for the enemy. This has a lot of things regarding the enemy's properties.
Author:
Paul

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      The update method. First, it verifies if it's the first time this class is updated and if so do nothing. Then checks if there are more checkpoints before going ahead. If it hasn't reached a checkpoint, continues on the direction it was already going. By the way the direction the enemy can go can only be up, right, down, left in this very order.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Entity

    • findNextCheckpoint

      Returns:
      found checkpoint

    • damage

      public void damage​(int amount)
      this method is used to calculate the damage the enemy takes.
      Parameters:
      amount - -> if tower A has X damage, the said enemy receives X damage and it's life is modified by + (- X)
